mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_003 (notice_title, notice_content, notice_date, admin_proper_num) VALUES (#{notice_title}, #{notice_content}, NOW(), #{admin_proper_num})
mapper.select:
select *, CONVERT(NOTICE_DATE, CHAR) AS NOTICE_DATE_as_varchar from TB_003
where 1=1
and NOTICE_TITLE like concat('%',#{cri.searchNotice},'%')
order by notice_proper_num desc limit #{cri.pageStart}, #{cri.amount}
select count(*) as total from TB_003
